Compress
[Example Web Pages]

The "../src/webpages/compress" folder contains an example of how to use the HTTP Compression feature of the Modtronix Web Server. The htm and txt files contained in this folder are compressed by the Modtronix Network Bootloader application. The HTML Server running on the Ethernet board sends these compressed files to a browser, which uncompresses them.
